name: GASERB
description:
GASERB is a puzzle game developed by a single developer.

If you like difficult and cleverly designed puzzle games with a sprinkle of platformer mechanics then this game is for you.

  • The Bar


The game offers unique challenges on every level with its unique mechanic. A mechanic that can change how the game works.

Challenge the timer bar which can change how the game works and see if you're clever and fast enough to beat it.

  • The Harpoon


  • Portals


  • 27 Unique Levels
